channel.title: Retirement on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Retirement on My New Hugo Site

item.title: /future
item.description:
Things I am looking forward to in…

The year 2026

Fridays

Kid2 will enter kindergarten, which means a sudden increase in time with no kids in the house. Since I work remotely on Fridays, this creates some opportunities for precious free-time.

It will be really nice to be able to spend some quiet time during the day with my wife. I would love to have semi-regular lunch dates.

The kids’ swimming school has a plan that lets parents of enrolled kids use the pool freely for a very reasonable monthly fee. I want to start swimming on Friday mornings. I’m terrible at swimming, but I do want to get better, and I’m hopeful that it will be a good source of exercise.
